title: 31 30 31 "The Mermen""The Worst Man in the Eastern Seas! Fishman Pirate Arlong!"Transliteration: "Higashi no Umi Saiaku no Otoko! Gyojin Kaizoku Āron!" (Japanese:東の海最悪の男!魚人海賊アーロン!) Yuji Endo Michiru Shimada 811.5 July 12, 2000(2000-07-12)[59] April 23, 2005[60]
